p.s: Teacher: The word for wild, is wild
Teacher: Now, how will you say wildest?
Student: wildsten?
Teacher: It's hard to say wildsten, isn't it?
Teacher: That's why we add an "-e" and make it wildesten
Student: wildesten
Teacher: Right. How would you say, "The horse is wild."
Student: Das Pferd ist wild.
Teacher: Good! How about, "The horse is wilder than the zebra."
Student: Das Pferd ist wilder als das Zebra.
Teacher: Wonderful. Now - "The horse is the wildest"?
Student: Das Pferd ist am wildesten.
Teacher: You're making great progress!
Teacher: How would you say, "The book is interesting"?
Student: Das Buch ist interessant.
Teacher: Excellent! Now, compare two books. "This book is more interesting than that book."
Student: Dieses Buch ist interessanter als dieses Buch.
Teacher: Fantastic! Lastly, tell me, "This book is the most interesting."
Student: Dieses Buch ist am interessantesten.
Teacher: Marvelous!
Teacher: How would you say, "The house is big"?
Student: Das Haus ist groß.
Teacher: Fantastic! Now, to say, "bigger", add an umlaut on the "o" too
Teacher: So großer becomes größer
Student: größer.
Teacher: Right! How would you say, "The house is bigger than the boat"
Student: Das Haus ist größer als das Boot.
Teacher: Very well! Lastly, tell me, "The house is the biggest."
Student: Das Haus ist am größten.
Teacher: Perfect!
Teacher: The word for "high", is hoch - hoch
Teacher: Just like the gh, in "laugh" became, ch in, "lachen"
Teacher: high becomes hoch - hoch
Teacher: How would you say, "The mountain is high" in the positive form?
Student: Der Berg ist hoch.
Teacher: Great! Now, compare two mountains. "The mountain is higher than the clouds."
Student: Der Berg ist höher als die Wolken.
Teacher: Wonderful! And finally, tell me, "The mountain is the highest."
Student: Der Berg ist am höchsten.
Teacher: Excellent job!
Teacher: We have seen how to say things like, "Max is the fastest". How would you say that?
Student: Max ist am schnellsten.
Teacher: Good. Now, if you wanna say, Max is the fastest man, it would be Max ist, der schnellste, Mann
